BillTitle: An Act to amend the Criminal Code and to amend other Acts
Information:
Her Excellency the Governor General in Council hereby

(a) revokes Order in Council P.C. 2002-1074 of June 13, 2002;

(b) fixes July 23, 2002, as the day on which the provisions of that Act come into force, other than sections 24 to 46, 48, 49, 59, 62, 66, 70, 71, 72, 79, 89 and 90;

(c) fixes September 23, 2002, as the day on which sections 49 and 62 come into force;

(d) fixes November 25, 2002, as the day on which sections 66, 70 and 71 come into force; and

(e) fixes July 23, 2003, as the day on which sections 24 to 46, 48, 59, 72, 79, 89 and 90 come into force.


SI/2002-106




Her Excellency the Governor General in Council hereby

(a) revokes paragraph (e) of Order in Council P.C. 2002-1295 of July 17, 2002;

(b) fixes July 23, 2003, as the day on which section 79 comes into force; and

(c) fixes December 1, 2003, as the day on which sections 24 to 46, 48, 59 and 72 come into force.



SI/2003-127




Her Excellency the Governor General in Council hereby

(a) revokes paragraph (c) of Order in Council P.C. 2003-933 of June 12, 2003 ; and



(b) fixes June 1, 2004, as the day on which sections 24 to 46, 48, 59 and 72 come into force.


SI/2003-182
LegisInfoNotes:
This Bill is part of former Bill C-15. See also Bill C-15B.

The Standing Committee on Justice and Human Rights considered the Bill on October 3, 2001 (Committee Meeting: 23) and Octobre 4, 2001 (Committee Meeting: 24).
Committee: Standing Senate Committee on Legal and Constitutional Affairs
